title: Predicate Logic
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
More expressive than Prop Logic. 
- **Objects**: Constants (Socrates).
- **Predicates**: Relations (Mortal(x)).
- **Quantifiers**: ForAll (∀), ThereExists (∃).

examples.code:
All men are mortal. Socrates is a man.
∀x (Man(x) -> Mortal(x))
Man(Socrates)
Infer: Mortal(Socrates).
